label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_003
content:

### Events
- Directory sync run #9 failed on first attempt due to LDAP bind timeout; rerun succeeded and reconciled 21 deletions.
- Opened three audit exceptions for missing manager approvals on elevated role grants; notified access review owners.
- Increased audit ingest lag p95 after enabling additional event enrichment fields; tuned worker batch size to recover.
- Performed scheduled rotation of signing keys for one internal OIDC client; verified downstream validation.

### On Call
- On Call Shift: J. Chen
- Pages: 3
- Tickets: 11
- Status: Monitoring; pipeline tuning applied and exceptions logged.
